block.p: DRILLINGS-Joel. Of Forest Hills, NY, on May 25, 2001. Loving husband of Wendy Manowitz Drillings. Stepfather of Lea and Josh Ozeri and brother of Harriet Tellem of Spring Valley, NY. Relatives and friends are invited to the service at Schwartz Brothers Funeral Home, 114-03 Queens Blvd (76th Road), Forest Hills, NY, on Tuesday, May 29, at 11 AM. In lieu of flowers please make donations to the American Heart Association, 7272 Greenville Ave, Dallas, TX 75231-4596.
